import React, {Component} from 'react' import MY_SERVICE from '../../services/index'; import 'bulma/css/bulma.css' import { Button,Icon } from 'react-bulma-components' export default class Signup extends Component{ state = { user: {} }; handleInput = (e) => { const { user } = this.state; const key = e.target.name; user[key] = e.target.value; this.setState({ user }); }; onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); MY_SERVICE.signup(this.state.user) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); this.props.history.push('/auth/login') }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; render() { return (
) } }
